languages.text: "Видите ли, шерин... На Футфоле действует одно главное правило — "дозволено все, пока это не мешает вести дела". Я — одна из тех, кто сумела в полной мере воспользоваться этим законом, и за последние годы настолько преуспела в своих делах, что теперь стала песчинкой в чужом завистливом глазу. Раньше мне строили мелкие козни, а теперь начали гадить по-крупному. Какой-то подлец украл мой груз и утащил его в глубины теневых кварталов — отвратное местечко, даже для ценителей неповторимой атмосферы Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Видите ли, ширин... На Футфоле действует одно главное правило — "дозволено все, пока это не мешает вести дела". Я — одна из тех, кто сумела в полной мере воспользоваться этим законом, и за последние годы настолько преуспела в своих делах, что теперь я стала песчинкой в чужом завистливом глазу. Раньше мне строили мелкие козни, а теперь начали гадить по крупному — один подлец украл мой груз. Увели прямо из-под носа в Подбрюшье — отвратное местечко, даже для ценителей неповторимой атмосферы Футфола".

languages.text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."
languages.original_text: "Видите ли, шерин... На Футфоле действует одно главное правило — "дозволено все, пока это не мешает вести дела". Я — одна из тех, кто сумела в полной мере воспользоваться этим законом, и за последние годы настолько преуспела в своих делах, что теперь стала песчинкой в чужом завистливом глазу. Раньше мне строили мелкие козни, а теперь начали гадить по-крупному. Какой-то подлец украл мой груз и утащил его в глубины теневых кварталов — отвратное местечко, даже для ценителей неповторимой атмосферы Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it's not hindering business. I'm one of those who have able to make use of this law to the fullest, and over the recent years I've hit it so big that I've become a grain of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to put their mind to it big time — some rascal stole my cargo. Right from under my nose, in the Underbelly — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

languages.text: 「実は…フットフォールにはある鉄則が存在してるんだ。商売の邪魔にならない限り何でもあり、ってね。アタシはその鉄則を最大限に利用してきた人間なんだけど、最近、成功しすぎてとある人物に目を付けられてしまったんだ。以前は、あちこちでアタシの取引を軽く妨害してきたんだけど、それが見過ごせない規模になってきたってわけ。フットフォール独特の雰囲気を愛する者も嫌うほど、影地域のもっともいかがわしい場所で、何者かに貨物が盗まれたんだ」
languages.original_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

traits.locale_text: 「実は…フットフォールにはある鉄則が存在してるんだ。商売の邪魔にならない限り何でもあり、ってね。アタシはその鉄則を最大限に利用してきた人間なんだけど、最近、成功しすぎてとある人物に目を付けられてしまったんだ。以前は、あちこちでアタシの取引を軽く妨害してきたんだけど、それが見過ごせない規模になってきたってわけ。フットフォール独特の雰囲気を愛する者も嫌うほど、影地域のもっともいかがわしい場所で、何者かに貨物が盗まれたんだ」

languages.text: “亲爱的，事情是这样……落脚港有一条最基本的规则，那就是只要不妨碍买卖，什么事都可以做。我就是那种最会利用规则的人。这几年来，我的买卖做得很大，有些人为此得了红眼病，将我视为眼中钉。他们过去就常常在我的生意中动些手脚，而现在，他们决定干脆把坏事做到底。有只老鼠偷走了我的货物，将它们藏到了阴影区最龌龊的地方。即使是最欣赏落脚港自由气氛的行家，也对那个地方避之不及。”
languages.original_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，事情是这样……落脚港有一条最基本的规则，那就是只要不妨碍买卖，什么事都可以做。我就是那种最会利用规则的人。这几年来，我的买卖做得很大，有些人为此得了红眼病，将我视为眼中钉。他们过去就常常在我的生意中动些手脚，而现在，他们决定干脆把坏事做到底。有只老鼠偷走了我的货物，将它们藏到了阴影区最龌龊的地方。即使是最欣赏落脚港自由气氛的行家，也对那个地方避之不及。”

languages.text: « Voyez-vous, shereen... Castel obéit à une règle fondamentale : tout est permis tant que cela ne nuit pas aux affaires. Et j'ai justement su exploiter cette règle au maximum, à tel point que j'ai fini par devenir une escarbille dans l'œil vert de quelqu'un. Cet individu me mettait des bâtons dans les roues de temps à autre, mais a depuis décidé de passer à la vitesse supérieure. Un scélérat a volé ma cargaison et l'a planquée dans les bas-fonds du Quartier des Ombres, un endroit minable, même pour les inconditionnels de l'atmosphère unique de Castel. »
languages.original_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

traits.locale_text: « Voyez-vous, shereen... Castel obéit à une règle fondamentale : tout est permis tant que cela ne nuit pas aux affaires. Et j'ai justement su exploiter cette règle au maximum, à tel point que j'ai fini par devenir une escarbille dans l'œil vert de quelqu'un. Cet individu me mettait des bâtons dans les roues de temps à autre, mais a depuis décidé de passer à la vitesse supérieure. Un scélérat a volé ma cargaison et l'a planquée dans les bas-fonds du Quartier des Ombres, un endroit minable, même pour les inconditionnels de l'atmosphère unique de Castel. »

languages.text: «Verá, shereen... Hay una regla fundamental en Paso: todo vale mientras no se interponga en el negocio de otra persona. Yo siempre he llevado esa regla al extremo y, en los últimos años, he sacado tales tajadas que me he vuelto un incordio para mis semejantes. Antes me saboteaban un par de acuerdos allí y allá, pero ahora van a por todas. Una rata de estas me ha robado el cargamento y se lo ha llevado a la parte más sórdida de los barrios bajos. El sitio es tan de mala muerte que no van ni los que mejor conocen el microcosmos único de Paso».
languages.original_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

traits.locale_text: «Verá, shereen... Hay una regla fundamental en Paso: todo vale mientras no se interponga en el negocio de otra persona. Yo siempre he llevado esa regla al extremo y, en los últimos años, he sacado tales tajadas que me he vuelto un incordio para mis semejantes. Antes me saboteaban un par de acuerdos allí y allá, pero ahora van a por todas. Una rata de estas me ha robado el cargamento y se lo ha llevado a la parte más sórdida de los barrios bajos. El sitio es tan de mala muerte que no van ni los que mejor conocen el microcosmos único de Paso».

languages.text: "Seht Ihr, Shereen ... Es gibt auf Footfall eine Grundregel ... alles ist erlaubt, solange es die Geschäfte nicht stört. Ich wusste diese Regel immer vortrefflich zu nutzen, und in den letzten Jahren habe ich es so weit getrieben, dass ich ein Dorn in jemandes grünem Auge wurde. Erst haben sie mir nur ab und an kleinere Steine in den Weg gelegt, aber neuerdings legen sie sich wirklich ordentlich ins Zeug. Irgendeine Ratte hat meine Fracht gestohlen und in den schäbigsten Teil der Schattenquartiere gebracht ... eine ganz miese Gegend, selbst für Kenner der einzigartigen Atmosphäre von Footfall."
languages.original_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big that I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

languages.text: "Şöyle ki şirinim... Binliman'da sadece tek bir temel kural vardır: İşe engel olmadığın sürece ne yapsan mübahtır. Bu kuraldan tamamıyla faydalanan birisiyim. Hatta son birkaç yılda voliyi öylesine vurdum ki âlemin derdi ben oldum. Eskiden de arada sırada işime köstek olurlardı ama artık hepsi canını dişine taktı. Sıçanın teki kargomu çalıp Gölge Mahalli'nin en tekinsiz yerlerine götürdü... Binliman'ın eşsiz atmosferinin erbapları için bile fazla köhne kalmış bir yerdir orası."
languages.original_text: "You see, shereen... There's one cardinal rule on Footfall — anything goes as long as it doesn't get in the way of business. I'm someone who's been able to exploit that rule to the fullest, and in recent years I've hit it so big I've become a speck of sand in someone's green eye. They used to throw small wrenches into my dealings here and there, but now they've decided to really put their backs into it. Some rat's stolen my cargo and dragged it off to the seediest part of the Shadow Quarters — a crummy place, even for connoisseurs of Footfall's unique atmosphere."

traits.locale_text: "Şöyle ki şirinim... Binliman'da sadece tek bir temel kural vardır: İşe engel olmadığın sürece ne yapsan mübahtır. Bu kuraldan tamamıyla faydalanan birisiyim. Hatta son birkaç yılda voliyi öylesine vurdum ki, âlemin derdi ben oldum. Eskiden de arada sırada işime köstek olurlardı da, artık hepsi canını dişine takmış. Sıçanın teki kargomu çalmış, Gölge Mahali'nin en tekinsiz yerlerine götürmüş... Binliman'ın eşsiz atmosferinin erbapları için bile fazla köhne kalmış bir yerdir orası."
